title: 25 Times Meghan Markle Simply Could Not Contain Her Laughter
text:
Meghan Markle is a beautiful person inside and out, but she really lights up a room with her smile. During various royal appearances, the Duchess of Sussex has caught a big case of the giggles, which resulted in some priceless pictures. Whether she's laughing with Prince Charles and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, about a bee trying to attack Prince Harry, sharing an inside joke with Queen Elizabeth II, or cutting loose during a mini dance party during her South African royal tour, there's just something so infectious about her laugh. See some of the funniest moments ahead.

Related:

Meghan Markle Is Just Getting Started - See All the Ways She's Making Change in 2019
